The People's University is back for round two of its educational webinar series titled "Manufactured Scarcity: Budgets 101," on Thursday, October 14.

We will discuss how decision-makers invest resources – from our tax dollars – into police, prisons, and away from education, social services, and other resources that are proven to keep our communities safe.

Register today for our online discussion "Manufactured Scarcity: Budgets 101."
